name: Rick & Morty like a Stickman - Fighting
name_original: Rick & Morty like a Stickman - Fighting
description:
Rick & Morty like a Stickman - Fighting

is a fascinating and addictive “beat em up” game with realistic physics and the main characters - Stickmans. Simple game controls allow you to perform unique stunts in sloumo mode!
Please yourself and your friends with an exciting game!

Features:
- Realistic Ragdoll Physics
- hardcore gameplay for hardcore gamers

It's fan game for enjoy!

Control:

wasd - moving around the field.

App Store!
